name: Cat Billiards
description:
This is a simple casual game. You bring the cats home by playing billiards. The cats you bring home can be interacted with the mouse and make cute sounds. Can you collect all 50 cats?

You can receive a cat every 30 seconds in the game

Press the Esc key to open the game settings interface, and click Settlement to end playing billiards.

Game features

50 cats
relaxing music
cute cat meows
Mouse click interaction
Billiards game play
